1124200.name: N.E.O Demo
1124200.description:
To survive, hone your skills.

Use your own skills and bow and arrow to clear the way,

Treasure hunting from a bird's-eye view, an authentic action RPG.

In response to many requests, the game controller is now supported! (*)

In conjunction with the controller support, the overall game balance has been adjusted and the UX has been optimized.

Enjoy the world of N.E.O., which has become easier to play and more comfortable, without changing the challenging battles and adventures!

(*)Some controllers are not compatible with N.E.O.

STORY

A terraforming project is underway on a planet for human settlement.

One day, without warning, communication with the settlement base is cut off.

Why did communication break down? What happened at the pioneer base?

Agent Isaac is dispatched to investigate, but just before he is about to descend to the planet, he is attacked by someone and crashes.

He loses his spaceship and almost all of the equipment he was carrying to investigate.

The reddish-bronze earth is left deserted and desolate after being thrown away in the middle of terraforming.

The only thing left at hand is his partner, the dog-shaped support robot Chobi.

In an unknown land where disturbing hostility awaits,

The harsh battle to survive and seek the truth begins.

SYSTEM

A full-fledged, low-down archery action RPG.

Losing his equipment, Isaac's only weapons are a bow and arrows that he was able to procure locally.

The bow can be power-charged by equipping and using it.

Different skills will be activated for each bow depending on the stage of power charge.

There are more than 30 types of skills in total. By using them in different ways depending on the situation, you can take advantage of the battle.

Many arrows also have special effects.

They can be crafted using materials obtained by defeating enemies or during the course of an adventure,

Use them to your advantage in battle.

Fat Just Action

In the world of N.E.O., Just Evade can be triggered by avoiding enemy attacks at the right moment.

When just evade occurs, you can automatically launch a powerful counterattack against the enemy,

Therefore, by actively aiming for Just Evade, you can take advantage of the battle.

Just Aim can also be triggered by hitting the enemy just before the enemy attacks.

Just Aim can inflict far more powerful damage on the enemy than normal,

When fighting tough enemies that are difficult to defeat, aim aggressively with Just Aim.

Treasure Hunt and Further Adventure

In the world of N.E.O, Isaac's bow is not the only thing you can find,

Isaac's armor and his partner Chobi's weapons and armor are also randomly dropped from enemies and objects.

The model type is the same equipment, but its performance, characteristics, and set skills change every time,

Through the adventure, you will find your own unique and strongest equipment that suits your fighting style.

Once you have the best equipment, challenge Hard Mode and Time Attack.

You can enjoy challenging battles against more ferocious and powerful enemies.
